properties.description: Data flow activity to split the large files (7 GB above) to file sizes of 5 GB each. Once after the splits, source files will get deleted

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	container_name as string,
	blob_name as string,
	file_name as string,
	file_size as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	purgeFiles: true) ~> SourceSplitLargeFiles
SourceSplitLargeFiles sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	filePattern:($file_name),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', (toInteger(floor(divide(toLong($file_size),toLong('5000000000')))))),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> AfterSplit
